title: Build Plan
content:
Plan # This is the high level plan to build ATE. The detail instructions for each step are in the right menu
Find a Name and Logo Build a Website Write a Business Plan Create an LLC Open Checking Account and Credit Card for the LLC Get money (funding) or loans to cover start-up expenses Plan business operations Get business licenses and permits Buy the right equipment (truck) Decals and Stickers Insurance coverage Understand and track income and expenses Find loads Stay in compliance
